metadata.name: Sukoon | Main Hoon Raahi
metadata.description:
Main Hoon Raahi - Daksh Kalra’s first original song drops as a 4 part NFT that celebrates the trials and triumphs of independent artists. 

#1 Sukoon: This is a collaboration of music and art by Daksh Kalra and Yashika Kalra.

Sukoon which means ‘Peace’ and ‘Satisfaction’ is an artwork from the series ‘Main Hoon Raahi’ that depicts finding home in the journey. It represents artists' pursuit to find their true selves describing  the thrill & excitement of new beginnings be it travelling, starting a new job or drawing a doodle on a fresh page. 

The artwork symbolizes community value, as independent artists support & guide each other like a flock of birds which is symbolic of harmony & independence. It shows a door of endless possibilities leading to various paths and stories.

Disclaimer: This NFT does not transfer any IP Rights ownership to the buyer. The Intellectual Property Rights of the NFT remains with the Artist, i.e. Daksh Kalra. NFTs are only meant for resale on the blockchain.
